title: Bob Mondello Watched 'The Interview,' So You Don't Have To (Really, You Don't)
teaser: Our movie critic reviews The Interview: He says it's not a political satire, or even satire of tabloid journalism. It's just another bromance, with jokes so bad he calls them "freshmanic."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
